name: Thorny Hydra
text_description: The Thorny Hydra strikes its enemies with a fierce attack. If this card defeats another card in battle, it gains +2 HP
illustration_description: A gigantic, multi-headed hydra stands in the midst of a dense forest. Its scales have a greenish hue, and its eyes shine with determination. Thorny vines wrap around its body, and one of the heads is lunging forward in an aggressive posture.
